title: Dr Xargle's Book of Earth Mobiles
description: In his usual refreshing and idiosyncratic way of teaching, Dr. Xargle, the great, green alien schoolmaster is now teaching his class about earthling modes of transportâ€”planes, for instance, have a tail, wings and a beak, but no feathers! And the class trip for this lesson? A genuine ride on a Ghost Train!
author: Jeanne Willis
